content: never having too many patterns for self-striping yarn i designed these socks to work with the yarn in a fun way of manipulating the stripes with a very easy to memorize chevron wave ======================================== **in addition to the pattern you will need the following materials to knit the chevron chase socks ** patricknits signature 85% merino superwash and 15% nylon 400 m / 437 yds 100g 1 skein in danke colorway as the mc louise robert collection super sock 75% merino superwash and 25% nylon 200 m / 219 yds 50g in klimt colorway as the cc 4 double-pointed needles or long circular needles for knitting magic loop in size 2 25mm or the size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle stitch markers choose your kit here 1 **size one size** length of foot adjustable **gauge** 36 sts = 10 cm 4² in stockinette stitch **note** the chevron chase socks are knit from the top down with an easy to memorize yet engaging front panel pattern la version française de ce patron se trouve sur leslainesbiscotte com 2 1 https //biscotte org/chevron-chase-kit 2 https //leslainesbiscotte com/products/chevron-chase-patron-de-bas-gratuit#
